answers.answer: Hi, Thank you for your question. From the symptoms you describe, it sounds that it could be an arthritis related, circulatory disturbance (due to compression of blood vessels) or a nerve pinched.  Besides it occurs due to anxiety, clots in blood vessels, excessive alcohol use or diabetes, due to injury to a nerve, pressure on spinal or peripheral nerves (neuropathy), vitamin deficiency etc. I would suggest evaluating all the possibilities with the help of a doctor first. Further referral to a neurologist will surely help you in getting a more precise opinion here. Hope this information proves help you.

question: pain radiates from knee to ankle joint. sometimes elbow to wrist joint. What is the possible diagnosis?
title: what is the dignosis?
